about_the_game:
This DLC requires the game "Wild Romance: Mofu Mofu Edition" as it uncensors all dialogue, scenes and character sprites from the game.

By downloading this DLC you confirm you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and consent to witnessing sexual content.

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes in the game that include: nudity, sexual jokes/innuendo, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.

detailed_description:
This DLC requires the game "Wild Romance: Mofu Mofu Edition" as it uncensors all dialogue, scenes and character sprites from the game.

By downloading this DLC you confirm you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and consent to witnessing sexual content.
name: Wild Romance: Mofu Mofu Edition - 18+ Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
  • Additional Notes: Requires the game "Wild Romance: Mofu Mofu Edition" version 1.4+

short_description: This DLC requires the game "Wild Romance: Mofu Mofu Edition" as it uncensors all dialogue, scenes and character sprites from the game.
